caption: The image features a purple background with a crescent moon and stars adorning the top. The text "ramadhan" is displayed prominently in the center of the image, with "mubarak" written below it. The text "May Allah grant you a life of peace and prosperity. I wish you a blessed Ramadan. Please remember me in your prayers" is written below the crescent moon, completing the image's message.
original_title: Purple Illustrated & Shiny Ornament Ramadhan Greetings Phone Wallpaper & Socmed Story
texts: May Allah grant you a life of peace and prosperity. I wish you a blessed Ramadan. Please remember me in your prayers.
